explains: n. 脚印，足迹；占用空间；覆盖区
wordGroup: ecological footprint 生态足迹，生态脚印
carbon footprint 碳足迹；碳排放量

sentences.en: We all need to look for ways to reduce our carbon footprint.
sentences.cn: 我们都需要寻找减少我们碳足迹的办法。

sentences.en: The water-cooling scheme will reduce the system's carbon footprint by up to 85 percent.
sentences.cn: 水冷却方案将减少系统的碳足迹高达85%。

sentences.en: After all, even if profit is the motive, the net result is a reduction in the hotel's "carbon footprint".
sentences.cn: 毕竟，即使动机是利润，最终的结果也是减少了酒店的“碳足迹”。
